meanings.definition: A condition characterized by an abnormally low level of neutrophils in the blood.
meanings.sent1: Neutropenias can make it harder for the body to fight infections.
meanings.sent2: The doctor diagnosed the patient with neutropenias after reviewing the blood test results.
meanings.sent3: When the neutropenias decided to take a vacation, the body's defense system went on strike.
meanings.sent4: Her immune system felt like a castle with neutropenias as the missing guards.
meanings.sent5: The classroom of the body was empty without the neutropenias to protect it from invaders.

meanings.definition: The presence of an insufficient number of neutrophils in the body.
meanings.sent1: Neutropenias can lead to increased susceptibility to infections.
meanings.sent2: The neutropenias in his system made him prone to getting sick easily.
meanings.sent3: The party of immune cells was incomplete without the neutropenias.
meanings.sent4: In a sea of blood cells, the neutropenias were the scarce sailors.
meanings.sent5: The neutropenias were like the brave soldiers protecting the body from harm.
